description.value:
[Generic][Limited Use] □□□

Effect Your struggles against the fearsome wildlife of Katapesh and the being manipulating the creatures has made you particularly good at dealing with dangerous animals. Whenever you roll a critical failure on a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Track] an animal, you can check a box next to this boon to get a failure instead.
